school_name: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
comments: She makes the class fun, without making lame jokes just to make things lighter. Rarely homework. If you do have homework, it\'s work you haven\'t finished in class. Great help, always clears things up if there is a problem.

school_name: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
comments: As long as you show up and participate and do the work, you\'ll be fine. There are no tests, just a few projects, short reflections, and an observation. Overall, the class was a lot of fun and she makes you look forward to having fun as a teacher. She\'s really nice and funny in her own way. She tries to keep the topics interesting.

school_name: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
comments: This intro class is pretty easy but she gives good insight into being a teacher. Definitely an easy A if you go to class but it\'s a really useful class. Also, she\'s the education advisor so you get to know her too!
